mapper.insert: insert into t_blog (id,title, content, first_picture, flag, views, appreciation, share_statement, commentabled,published, recommend,create_time, update_time, type_id, user_id, description) values (#{id},#{title},#{content},#{firstPicture},#{flag},#{views},#{appreciation}, #{shareStatement},#{commentabled},#{published},#{recommend},#{createTime}, #{updateTime},#{typeId},#{userId},#{description})
mapper.update:
update t_blog set published = #{published}, flag = #{flag} , title = #{title}, content = #{content},
type_id = #{typeId},
first_picture = #{firstPicture}, description = #{description}, recommend = #{recommend}, share_statement = #{shareStatement}, appreciation = #{appreciation}, commentabled = #{commentabled},
published = #{published},
update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
update t_blog_tags set tags_id=#{param2} where blogs_id=#{param1}
update t_blog set views=views+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select b.id,b.title,b.update_time,b.published,b.recommend,b.views,b.type_id,t.id,t.name from t_blog b left join t_type t on b.type_id = t.id order by b.update_time desc
select tags_id from t_blog_tags where blogs_id=#{blogsId}

SELECT b.id,b.first_picture,b.flag,b.title,b.content,b.views,b.update_time,b.commentabled,b.share_statement, b.appreciation,b.description,b.type_id,b.recommend,b.published, u.nickname,u.avatar,t.id tid ,t.name from t_blog b, t_user u, t_type t where b.user_id = u.id and b.type_id = t.id and u.id = #{id}

select b.id,b.first_picture,b.flag,b.title,b.content,b.views,b.update_time,b.commentabled,b.share_statement, b.appreciation,b.description,b.type_id,b.recommend,b.published,u.nickname,u.avatar,t.id tid ,t.name from t_blog b, t_user u, t_type t where b.user_id = u.id and b.type_id = t.id and b.id = #{id}
select t.id,t.name from t_blog_tags bt,t_tag t where bt.blogs_id=#{blogsId} and bt.tags_id=t.id

SELECT b.id,b.first_picture,b.flag,b.title,b.content,b.views,b.update_time,b.commentabled,b.share_statement, b.appreciation,b.description,b.type_id,b.recommend,b.published, u.nickname,u.avatar,t.id tid ,t.name from t_blog b, t_user u, t_type t where b.user_id = u.id and b.type_id = t.id and u.id = 1 and b.title like #{query}
